alert.note: Alert for Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 08 at 1:24AM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 feet above 8,000 feet. Snowfall of 2 to 5 feet from 5,000 feet to 8,000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet from 4,000 feet to 5,000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite NP and Upper San Joaquin River. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Count on road closures due to snow cover. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches along with blowing snow that could significantly reduce visibilities. Snow accumulating in the Yosemite Valley by early Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley
